## StringEncoding.byIANACharSetName() method

Looks up a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) by corresponding IANA character set identifier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static byIANACharSetName(charset: string): StringEncoding;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  charset | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`StringEncoding`

The found [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Throws [UnrecognizedEncodingError](./iconv-corefoundation.unrecognizedencodingerror.md) if not recognized and supported.

This uses the Core Foundation function [CFStringConvertIANACharSetNameToEncoding](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/1542975-cfstringconvertianacharsetnameto?language=objc)<!-- -->.
